The claim was made by Cecile Richards: the president of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America, during a conversation about abortion rights.
The claim was based on a: fact sheet" from the Guttmacher Institute, a nonprofit organization that promotes reproductive health and abortion rights.
The fact sheet stated that the U: S. has the highest unintended pregnancy rate among Western industrialized countries, with 51-plus percent of pregnancies in 2008 being unintended.
The rate of unintended pregnancies in th: S. was calculated to be 54 per 1,000 women aged 15-44, according to the Guttmacher fact sheet.
